thread.title: European stocks end day mixed

title: European stocks end day mixed
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Aug 17, 2015, 16:59 BST - UK Markets closed European stocks end day mixed AFP – 12 minutes ago View Photo 

Europe's main stock markets ended an up-and-down session mixed Monday, with London's FTSE 100 index creeping 0.01 percent higher at 6,550.30 points. 
In the eurozone, the CAC 40 in Paris gained 0.57 percent to finish at 4,984.83, while Frankfurt's DAX 30 dropped 0.41 percent to 10,940.33 points compared with Friday's close.
